subject: Roblox Password Reset Request
body:
Roblox Password Reset Request Hello,

325397 is your Roblox Security Code. Enter it into the recovery page to recover. This code will be active for 15 mins.

Do not share this code. We will never contact you to ask for it.

You are receiving this email as there was a request to reset your password. If you didn't make this request, you can just ignore this email. Please review our help article for more information on Account Security. Do not reply to this email as it will not be received. If you need assistance, please visit us at Roblox Support.

This recovery request was received from unknown.

Thank you,

The Roblox Team
